name: Zombie War
storyline:
In 2024, an unknown virus has passed. Only zombies are infested on the peninsula.
We got the information that a trillion gold bars were left somewhere in Yeouido. With various clues left everywhere, hope you find that place. If you go to a place where you can see the light, you will find the previous securement bases.
Find guns and hospitals and convenience stores. You can acquire weapons, heal, and recover health.
The helicopter can only go to the entrance due to electromagnetic interference... please! I hope you find a trillion gold bars and come back alive...
Good Luck!!!
summary: Zombie War is a strategic FPS TPS shooting game to relieve stress. Perform missions in the war against zombies. Even beginners can easily start the game at the training ground. A machine gun (M134), flamethrower, grenade, and flash grenade are added, with up to 2 remote allies (TCP/IP).
